statements: SELECT * FROM nft_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner, nft_price FROM nft_data WHERE nft_price > 100;
SELECT nft_name, nft_description FROM nft_data WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM nft_data WHERE nft_description LIKE '%digital%';
SELECT nft_owner, nft_price, nft_image_url FROM nft_data WHERE nft_price < 50.00 ORDER BY nft_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT nft_name, nft_owner, nft_price FROM nft_data WHERE nft_price > 1000;
SELECT nft_name, nft_image_url FROM nft_data WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT nft_owner, nft_description FROM nft_data WHERE nft_description LIKE '%digital art%';
SELECT nft_name, nft_price FROM nft_data WHERE nft_price < 500 ORDER BY nft_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT token_id, owner FROM NFTs ORDER BY owner ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NFTs WHERE owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE owner = 'Bob' AND id > 10;
SELECT token_id, encryption_key FROM NFT_Encryption_Keys WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT id, owner, encrypted_content FROM NFTs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE owner = 'Alice' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, token_id FROM NFTs WHERE owner = 'Bob' AND encrypted_content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT NFTs.id, NFTs.owner, NFT_Encryption_Keys.encryption_key FROM NFTs JOIN NFT_Encryption_Keys ON NFTs.token_id = NFT_Encryption_Keys.token_id;
SELECT owner, COUNT(*) AS num_owned FROM NFTs GROUP BY owner ORDER BY num_owned DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM nft_users WHERE username='Alice';
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM nft_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, transaction_date FROM nft_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM nft_items WHERE owner_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM nft_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM nft_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT item_name, owner_id FROM nft_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, buyer_id, seller_id FROM nft_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, i.item_name, u.username FROM nft_transactions t JOIN nft_items i ON t.item_id = i.item_id JOIN nft_users u ON t.buyer_id = u.user_id WHERE t.seller_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM NFT_Owners;
SELECT owner_name, nft_id FROM NFT_Owners WHERE id = 1;
SELECT token_name, token_type FROM NFT_Tokens ORDER BY nft_id DESC;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id FROM NFT_Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, access_time, action_taken FROM NFT_Access_Logs WHERE log_id < 100 ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Tokens WHERE owner_id = 10;
SELECT nft_id, token_name FROM NFT_Tokens WHERE token_type = 'Digital';
SELECT owner_name, token_name, transaction_date FROM NFT_Owners JOIN NFT_Tokens ON NFT_Owners.nft_id = NFT_Tokens.nft_id;
SELECT owner_name, token_name, transaction_date FROM NFT_Owners JOIN NFT_Tokens ON NFT_Owners.nft_id = NFT_Tokens.nft_id WHERE owner_id = 15;
SELECT nft_id, seller_id, buyer_id, transaction_date FROM NFT_Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM NFTUsers;
SELECT username, email FROM NFTUsers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, description FROM NFTItems ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFTTransactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT receiver_id, timestamp FROM NFTTransactions WHERE sender_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTUsers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, email FROM NFTUsers WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFTItems WHERE owner_id = 100 ORDER BY id ASC, name DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM NFTItems WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT t.id, t.transaction_hash, u.username AS sender, u.email AS sender_email, t.amount FROM NFTTransactions t JOIN NFTUsers u ON t.sender_id = u.id ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;
